ygData.subject: RE: I have some possible bad news Disenchanting results with Melody
ygData.msgSnippet: It works, I used it tonight to get rid of my illusion -Martyn ... From: Firehawk [mailto:firehawk@cloud9.net] Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 7:37 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
It works, I used it tonight to get rid of my illusion
-Martyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Firehawk [mailto:firehawk@...]
Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 7:37 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] I have some possible bad news Disenchanting results
with Melody


From: "Firehawk" <firehawk@...>


I do not mean to raise an alarm especially on a song that was never
particularly useful. However I just had been hit with a Steal Strength
spell by a SK when passing through South Karana. I took the opportunity to
test one of our more useless songs.. after 10 pulses it never managed to
remove the spell. I ask our stronger kin to please test these results and
make sure the song was not killed again.

Adon
